front.title: Update to OSPF Graceful Restart procedure

abstract.t: This document suggests improvements to OSPF v2 Graceful Restart. The basic protocol working remains as specified in [OSPFGR]. The draft describes a two pronged approach for improving the current graceful restart mechanism. It improves the restarting routerâ€™s ability to detect and react to topology changes. It also reduces the conservative behavior of the helper router in reacting to topology changes.
